title: Easements, etc., along state highways
context: ยง264-13 Easements, etc., along state highways. Notwithstanding any law to the contrary, the governor or the director of transportation as the governor&rsquo;s designee, may dispose of easements within and access rights along the state highway rights-of-way under such terms and conditions which, in the director&rsquo;s opinion, are in the best interest of the public. [L 1966, c 30, ยง2; HRS ยง264-13; gen ch 1985; am L 1991, c 36, ยง1; gen ch 1992]
